name: Puzzle Island: Match 3 Game
description:
Play Exciting Match 3 Puzzles, Build your Village and Collect Heroes!
Defend the Island against General Chicken’s invading enemies!

Match 3 Island Vibes!
► Solve fun Match 3 puzzles to defeat enemies
► Merge 4 or more orbs to unleash legendary combos
► Complete fun missions with challenging surprises

Unite your own Squad of Heroes!
► Choose your team from legendary heroes, monsters, toons, dragons, pirates, ninjas, pets and many more!
► Collect heroes from match 3 puzzles or grab machines

Play with Friends
► Invite your friends and join up on an island adventure
► Create squads and clash with players from all over the world
► Chat to share tips & strategies, form squads and create friendships

Build your own Village!
► Upgrade buildings to increase resource production & Hero power
► Build hospitals, research centers, factories & laboratories
► Create battle items and custom battle boards to edge battles in your favor
► Join empires of other villages and clans or go to war with others

Single Player Campaign Adventure!
► Go on a Quest to defeat bosses in exciting locations
► Collect resources and powerful heroes along the way!
► Play through tons of levels with challenging surprises!

Join the Fun Free Match 3 Puzzle Blitz RPG Game! Download Now for Free!
